data.name: Escape From Eternity
data.detailed_description:
"ESCAPE FROM ETERNITY" is an arcade game about jordan, a former demonic soldier who seeks freedom, he has an infinite ammo rifle where he destroys any creature that tries to stop his path, escape from eternity was made to give you an adrenaline injection in a few minutes of gameplay, soon escape from eternity will receive other game modes and updates that will leave the game with an extravagant experience




  • escape from eternity has immersive and cool gameplay


  • simple and easy mechanics
data.about_the_game:
"ESCAPE FROM ETERNITY" is an arcade game about jordan, a former demonic soldier who seeks freedom, he has an infinite ammo rifle where he destroys any creature that tries to stop his path, escape from eternity was made to give you an adrenaline injection in a few minutes of gameplay, soon escape from eternity will receive other game modes and updates that will leave the game with an extravagant experience




  • escape from eternity has immersive and cool gameplay


  • simple and easy mechanics
data.short_description: Jordan is a demon super soldier who is tired of doing evil and decides to leave the demonic army once and for all but... The demon king was not happy with this decision

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: ntel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz ou AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Placa Integrada HD 4400 ou superior
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: ntel Core i5-4460, AMD FX 4300 ou superior
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 ou superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
